backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing bookings in a Map, allowing creation with duplicate checks and retrieval by month with sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global component styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry page with PWA manifest, theme color, iOS meta tags, and script bootstrap for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining icons, names, theme colors, categories, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching of static assets, cache cleanup, and offline fallback behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component registering the service worker and rendering all sections including AppLinkArea and TroubleshootingPanel.
frontend/src/components/AppLinkArea.tsx: Component showing the current app URL with a copy-to-clipboard button and fallback text-selection behavior.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Simple layout wrapper providing a centered max-width container with page padding.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Booking form with validation, month selection, backend submission, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Displays the site's brand header with logo, title, subtitle, and a hero image.
frontend/src/components/ContactLocationS: Shows contact info including phone, WhatsApp, address, and a link to Google Maps.
frontend/src/components/HotelsDistanceSe: Lists hotel distance information for Mecca and Madina locations.
frontend/src/components/InstagramSection: Provides a button linking to the service's Instagram profile.
Renders a scrollable list of months allowing users to select one.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Displays a PWA install prompt with platform-specific instructions and install handling.
frontend/src/components/TroubleshootingP: Expandable panel offering troubleshooting steps for app access issues.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateBookingMutat: Provides a mutation for creating bookings via the backend actor and invalidates booking queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Detects PWA installability, handles beforeinstallprompt events, and manages install prompts.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark OKLCH theme variables plus base styles.
frontend/src/lib/slugify.ts: Provides a slugify function enforcing an ICP-safe 5â€“50 char hostname label and a helper returning the app slug.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge Tailwind and conditional class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load and logs registration success or failure.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, plugins, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, known issues, and architecture notes for the Azhari Tours & Travels mobile app.
